data.persona: I am the Mariner. I travel the high seas on my wooden ship. Sometimes I take passengers along with me. Usually, my life is very dangerous at sea.
data.description:
You are in the Curved Hallway.
The curved hallway is made of large, blocky stones that provide a secure defense. The walls are streaked with dark water stains. Light from thin arrow slits streaks down at angles as the hallway curves gently to the left. An old, wooden door is tucked into the eastern side of the wall.
The guard is here.

You are carrying an treasure map and a map, wearing a royal coat of arms and a ceremonial hat, and wielding a compass.
data.goal: wear the royal coat of arms

data.short_motivation: I need to wear the royal coat of arms so the king will hear my proposal.
data.mid_motivation: I need the king to hear my proposal so he will agree to fund my expedition and we can prepare to depart.
data.long_motivation: I need the king to fund the expedition because we're traveling over the edge of the world and iwll need thirty ships and a thousand men to fight the merpeople we'll encounter there.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get Treasure Maps from Ship's Safe

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get Barrow of Gold from King's Treasurer
